text:
DEPARTMENT OF
HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE
OFFICE OF EDUCATION
WASHINGTON 25, D. C,
October 21, 1954
Mr* Graydon Ausmus
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Graydont
The Program Planning Committee of the NAEB, the
JCET, and ourselves are~alT"Triterested in having a meeting
during the Convention in New York not only on program
policies but also on other top-flight management problems*
I wonder if you can set aside IOjOO p.m. on Thursday
night the 28th for such a meeting? We would get together
in Roan 101-3 which is JCET headquarters at the Biltmore
in order to exchange views*
Bob Shenkkan, Ralph Steetle and I are meeting up
here in lfeshington to work out an informal agenda before
we go up to New York*
Let me know whether you can come late Thursday night
and if you can't, tell me what other time might be convenient*
We will shift it if there are enough fellows who can't come
at that hour.
See you in New Yorkl
Franklin Dunham
Chief of Radio-Television
